definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: suck (NH id.; Aram. [[יְנַק]], yinaq, and deriv.; As. êniḳu, suck, SASm:Asrb. i, Gloss, mušeniḳtu, nurse, Jen:ZA, 1886, 402)—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְיׇנַקְתְּ]] consec. Is 60:16; [[וִינַקְתֶּם]] Is 66:12; Impf. [[יִינׇ֑ק]] Job 20:16; [[אִינׇ֑ק]] Job 3:12; [[תִּינׇ֑קִי]] Is 60:16; [[יִינׇ֑קוּ]] De 33:19; [[תִּינְקוּ]] Is 66:11; Pt. [[יוֹנֵק]] De 32:25 + 7 t.; [[יׁנֵק]] Nu 11:12; [[יוֹנְקִים]] Ps 8:3; [[יוֹנְקֵי]] Joe 2:16; —suck, of infant at mother's breast, abs. Job 3:12; metaph. of abundance and honour of Jerusalem in future, Is 66:11 abs.; sq. acc. of breast Is 60:16, acc. of milk v:Is 60:16, Is 66:12; sq. acc. [[ראׁשׁ]] [[פְּתָנִים]] Job 20:16 of punishment of wicked; pt. sq. acc. [[יוֹנֵק שְׁדֵי אִמִּי]] Ct So 8:1; cstr. [[יוֹנְקֵי־שָׁדַיִם]] Joe 2:16; elsewh. as subt., suckling, babe Nu 11:12, De 32:25 (opp. [[אִישׁ שֵׂיבָה]]); ‖[[עוֹלֵל]] 1Sa 15:3, 1Sa 22:19, Ps 8:3, Je 44:7, La 2:11; ‖[[עוֹלָל]] La 4:4; cf. Joe 2:16; ‖[[גָּמוּל]] Is 11:8; —on Is 53:2 v. [[יוֹנֵק]] infr.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[הֵינִ֫יקָה]] Ge 21:7; [[הֵנִ֫יקוּ]] La 4:3; Impf. sf. [[וַיֵּנִקֵ֫הוּ]] De 32:13; 3 fs. [[תֵּינִק]] Ex 2:7; [[וַתֵּ֫נֶק]] 1Sa 1:23; [[וַתְּנִיקֵ֫הוּ]] Ex 2:9; Imv. fs. sf. [[הֵינִקִ֫הוּ]] v:Ex 2:9; Inf. [[לְהֵינִיק]] 1Ki 3:21; Pt. [[מֵינֶ֫קֶת]] Ex 2:7; cstr. id. Ge 35:8; [[מֵנִקְתּוֹ]] 2Ki 11:2; [[מֵינִקְתּוֹ]] 2Ch 22:11; [[מֵנִקְתָּהּ]] Ge 24:59; [[מֵינִיקוֹת]] Ge 32:16; [[מֵינִיקִתַיִח]] Is 49:23; —give suck to, nurse, sq. acc. Ge 21:7, 1Ki 3:21, Ex 2:7, Ex 2:9, 1Sa 1:23; cause to suck honey, fig. De 32:13 (2 acc.); of animals La 4:3 sq. acc.; pt. fem.= nursing, [[אִשָּׁה מֵינֶקֶת]] Ex 2:7 lit. a nursing woman, a nurse; ´[[מ]] alone as subst. = nurse Ge 24:59 (J), Ge 35:8 (E; [[דְּבׂרָה]]), 2Ki 11:2, 2Ch 22:11; metaph. Is 49:23; of camels [[גְּמַלִּים מֵינִיקוֹת]] Ge 32:16.
